column1: The halls of Nienna lay at the westernmost border of Aman
column2: near the halls of Mandos. Here dwelt the Valar Nienna and it is said that the windows of her house looked "outward from the Walls of the World".

column1: As described in an early version of the legendarium
column2: Nienna chose for her dwelling a wide and dark hall in the Halls of Mandos. This hall she named Fui

column1: At Fui was summoned the Men after death
column2: to await their doom.Christopher Tolkien has noted that this conception changes in later versions
column3: where it is instead Mandos who appears as the Doomsman of the Valar (
